name: Associação dos Docentes e Orientadores de Medicina Geral e Familiar
headAddress: Rua de Moçambique, nº 33, R/chão Dto,  Coimbra
goal:
To promote and maintain high standards in the learning and teaching of General and Family Medicine;
To contribute to the improvement of professional dignity of our members and to defend their interests, as physicians and teachers in primary care;
To strengthen the solidarity between Teachers, Tutors and Supervisors of speciality of General and Family Medicine;
To promote the continuos improvement of our associates in scientific field, technical, cultural, organizational and ethical
euInitiatives: policies and laws about medical education and primary healthcare organization
